stepAnswer: you can open and access the file, but not make permanent changes to it; forces users to save changes to the template with a new file name
stepTitle: What is the purpose of creating a read-only file?
choices: you can open and access the file, but not make permanent changes to it; forces users to save changes to the template with a new file name
to only allow people to read and not make changes of any kind
to share sensitive information with users
